articles.title: Annemiek van Vleuten takes final stage by 30 seconds to win women's Tour de France
articles.description: Veteran rider Annemiek van Vleuten won the women's Tour de France for the first time on Sunday.
articles.content:
PLANCHE DES BELLES FILLES, France -- Veteran rider Annemiek van Vleuten won the women's Tour de France for the first time on Sunday after clinching the eighth and final stage in style.

articles.title: Jacob deGrom set to make 2022 debut for New York Mets on Tuesday vs. Washington Nationals
articles.description: Jacob deGrom, who has not pitched for the Mets since July 2021, will make his season debut Tuesday against the Nationals, according to manager Buck Showalter.
articles.content:
New York Mets ace Jacob deGrom will make his 2022 major league debut Tuesday against the Washington Nationals, manager Buck Showalter told reporters Sunday.

articles.title: Amanda Nunes gets revenge, recaptures UFC women's bantamweight title from Julianna Peña
articles.description: Amanda Nunes regained the UFC women's bantamweight title with a dominant decision victory over Julianna Pena on Saturday night at UFC 277.
articles.content:
DALLAS -- Amanda Nunes vowed to make changes in her game. She vowed to get her belt back after shockingly losing it seven months ago to Julianna Peña.
